1: Sir Syed Sani Syed Ali Shah Bukhari

3:
--------------------
<Text: Sir Syed Sani Syed Ali Shah Bukhari:  He was the khateeb (Orator), Imam and Mirwaiz of the Grand Jamia Masjid Beerwah whose foundation stone was laid by his elder brother, Syed Syeed Shah Bukhari, in 1928.>

4:
--------------------
Text: Sir Syed Sani Syed Ali Shah Bukhari:  Syed Shah Bukhari was the Imam/Mirwaiz of historical Jamia Masjid, Srinagar after Mirwaiz Yousef Sahib until he left the Kashmir Valley.
